data.name: Flesh Everest
data.detailed_description:
Heavily inspired by old retro horror games, FLESH EVEREST mixes a rogue-like survival experience with the shooting mechanics of Silent Hill and Resident Evil. Ammo is rare, enemies are tough, and each bullet counts. Built within a massive living organism, the Flesh Everest Nature Attraction is a one-of-a-kind facility that houses its own theme park! It seems, however, that some cataclysmic event is occurring. Play as a police officer responding to multiple distress calls coming from miles below the flesh's surface.

Features

  • No two playthroughs will ever be the same. Loot to survive as you experience randomly generated structures, enemies, and weapons.
  • Start with nothing and scavenge for better weapons and gear to defend yourself
  • Face flesh entities with varying levels of threat. Some may be docile while others are highly aggressive.
  • Death is permanent. Lose everything on death and start a newly generated experience.
  • Multiple NPC interactions with random encounters
  • Multiple Endings
  • Old-80s Liminal Spaces
  • Retro and VHS style
  • Meat Mountain Meatballs

data.short_description: Explore a randomized facility built within a massive living mountain of flesh. Flesh Everest mixes a rogue-like survival experience with shooting mechanics inspired by Silent Hill and Resident Evil. Death is permanent and ammo is limited.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce Gt 730
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
